'''Holiday Skin Pack 2015'''<ref>{{Cite|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20151216161148/http://mojang.com/|website=Mojang.com|title=Pocket Edition gets Festive Skin Pack! Bug fixes!|author=Owen Hill|date=December 16, 2015}}</ref> is a holiday-themed [[skin pack]] in celebration of Christmas in 2015, and has 33 skins to choose from. It was the first ''Bedrock Edition'' skin pack to include extra geometry on the skin model and includes all skins that were previously part of the [[Festive Skin Pack]] for [[Legacy Console Edition]]s.

== Trivia ==
* Despite the Marketplace description stating that 35 skins are included, the skin pack only contains 33 skins. 
* A version of the pack containing only Jumper?, Warm Woolly, Snug Snoozy, and Casual Comfy is included as a default on [[Minecraft Education|''Minecraft Education'']].
